Catagory.Title: Quadcopter
Catagory.Explanation: A team of students built the drivers for the instrumentation for a quadcopter(A helicopter with 4 propellers) Then attempted to get all the instruments to work together to fly autonomously.

Catagory.Title: Game
Catagory.Explanation: This is the perfect place for students to demonstrate what they learned in cmpt 230(Game Design), cmpt 330(2D Gaming), and cmpt 430(3D Gaming and AI). A few groups and individuals have decided to implement video games.

Catagory.Title: WebSite
Catagory.Explanation: Building a Website is great for developing the ideas explored in cmpt 315(Web-Centric Computing and eCommerce).

Catagory.Title: About Student Projects
Catagory.Explanation: As part of the graduation requirements for a Major in computer science all students are required to complete either a group or individual project. The projects are chosen by the students to demonstrate what they have learned here at MacEwan. Students can come up with the idea for there project by themselves or get ideas from there professors.

Catagory.Title: Smart Phone applications
Catagory.Explanation: Smart Phone Development is a rapidly growing sector of computer science. Developing applications to work on android or ios devices will be a wonderful addition to any portfolio.
